about_the_game:
The Economic West is a vast and immersive western survival open-world game set in the rugged landscape of the 1890s frontier. Players take on the role of settlers, traders, and entrepreneurs, navigating the harsh realities of the Wild West while striving to build their fortunes. Whether you choose to play alone in single-player mode or brave the West with others in a multiplayer world, every decision you make will affect not only your survival but the economy of the region around you. With a heavy emphasis on resource management, trade, and crafting, this game challenges you to balance the threats of nature with the opportunities of a growing frontier economy.

In The Economic West, the world is your oyster—forge your path by building businesses, establishing trade routes, and interacting with the environment and other players. Each moment in the game is filled with choices that affect the larger story, as your actions influence both the local and regional economy. Will you become a successful tycoon, a feared outlaw, or a humble homesteader? The direction is yours to shape.

Key Features:

  • Survival and Resource Management:

    • Experience the harsh realities of life on the frontier with a dynamic survival system that requires you to gather food, water, and shelter.

    • Scavenge for materials like wood, minerals, and leather to craft tools, weapons, and structures.

    • Manage your health, stamina, and economy while dealing with the elements, wildlife, and hostile encounters.

  • Economic Simulation:

    • Build and manage businesses, from ranches and farms to saloons and trading posts.

    • Buy and sell goods with NPCs and other players through an in-depth barter and trade system.

    • Watch the market fluctuate based on your decisions, with supply and demand affecting prices and availability of goods.

  • Multiplayer and Cooperative Play:

    • Team up with other players to create thriving towns and trade networks.

    • Engage in cooperative missions or compete for dominance over resources and territory.

    • Work together to build large-scale ventures, such as mining operations, livestock ranches, or supply chains, to increase your wealth and power.

    • Player-driven economy where actions have direct impacts on the world and other players.

  • Crafting, Bartering, and Trading:

    • Craft unique items, from weaponry and tools to furniture and structures, using raw materials found throughout the world.

    • Trade crafted goods, raw materials, and rare resources to expand your wealth in the west.

    • Negotiate and barter with NPCs and players to get the best deals, using reputation, wealth, and resources to influence others.

  • Building and Customization:

    • Construct a variety of structures, from log cabins to ranches and towns.

    • Customize your properties and businesses with upgrades, decorations, and functional improvements.

    • Design and develop your homestead or trading post to fit your vision, whether that’s a thriving marketplace or a quiet retreat.

  • Dynamic World and Economy:

    • A living, breathing world with fluctuating weather, seasonal changes, and an evolving economy.

    • Your choices can trigger changes in the local economy, affecting the availability of goods, and services.

  • Progression and Reputation System:

    • Build your reputation as a businessman, outlaw, or community leader through your actions.

    • Complete quests, missions, and challenges to gain experience, unlock new skills, and improve your standing.

    • Choose your moral path, as decisions can lead to fame, fortune, or infamy, shaping how NPCs and other players interact with you.

Will you rise to prominence or be swallowed by the unforgiving landscape of The Economic West?

The frontier is waiting for a leader, and it could be you—if you have the will to survive, adapt, and thrive in a world where everything has a price.

content_descriptors.notes: Guns, hunting animals, NPC and player deaths.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600X, Intel Core i7-6800K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT, NVIDIA GeForce 1080

short_description: *The Economic West* is a western survival open-world game set in the 1890s. Build businesses, trade, and craft in a dynamic world where every decision impacts your survival and the economy. Play solo or multiplayer, manage resources and rise to prominence—or be left behind in the harsh frontier.
